name: Time Catch!
description:
Fight against your friends with the ability to rewind them and yourself!

Please note: This game is multiplayer only.

Time Catch! is a game which was created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2.
All graphics, sounds, music and code were created in one week by myself and I did not use any assets which were created before the jam.

In Time Catch! you play catch against your friends with some special abilities:
1. You can rewind yourself.
2. You can rewind other players in a certain radius around you. While you are using this ability you can´t move.

But you have to be careful! Every time you use one of your abilities you have to recharge. An indicator on your head shows if you are charged: glowing means that you are charged and not glowing means that you are not charged.

When you are close enough to a player you can try to catch him. In return you will receive a small speed boost. However, if you fail to catch someone you fall down and cannot move for a short amount time.
After one or less player remains the round ends and another round starts automatically.

After 16 rounds the game ends.

Controls:

Keyboard:
[W], [A], [S], [D] - Walk
[Space] - Catch
[Q]  - Rewind yourself (hold)
[E] - Create a time wave
[F] - Recharge (hold)

Controller:
Left Stick - Walk
(A) - Catch
(Y)  - Rewind yourself (hold)
(X) - Create a time wave
(B) - Recharge (hold)
